name: MediaRhyme
overview:
MediaRhyme is a search engine that searches for any file on the Internet (Audio/Video/E-book/Torrent and includes a Web/Twitter/Facebook Search + a Dictionary & a Translator) Today the term â€œFree Downloadâ€ is creepy for most of the users on the web, since itâ€™s illegal and may contain viruses that will be able to corrupt your computer. 1) MediaRhyme is efficient since the website inputs the data that will be shown to the user in a very organized and fast way (the website automatically shows the user the best link that doesnâ€™t contain any spy-ware). 2) MediaRhyme is 100% Legal â€¦ What??? How???

When you go and search for anything (song, video, torrentâ€¦) for example you want to search for a song for the Beatles you go to Google or any search engine and input the name of your song ; links come up and , to download the song you should click all of these links and search for the song you want , thus taking time and energy ; and maybe in the end finding a different song that contains a virus â€¦ What MediaRhyme does is that it scans these links to provide the users with the best and most resumable link found.

MediaRhyme’s search technology produces search results that reference media content and content information located worldwide throughout the Internet. The services provided by MediaRhyme are based on third party sites. The linked sites are in no way connected to, under the control of, associated with MediaRhyme. These third party links provided by MediaRhyme are for your easy navigating and convenience, and do not imply endorsement by MediaRhyme of the site or any association with their operators. MediaRhyme is not responsible of any offending material found in these services.
